subSections.title: Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=guò,tl=y
|m_note=guo - variant (''verbal or adjectival complement indicating occurrence or completion'')
|m-s=go4
|dg=гуә3
|c=gwo3,gwo1
|h=pfs=ko
|md=guó
|mn=xm,tp,mg,hc:kè/qz,lk,sx,km,hc:kèr/zz,kh,tn,yl,tc:kòe/kòa/xm,zz,tw:kò/qz:kò͘/qz:ko͘/xm,zz:ko/qz,xm,zz:koa
|mn_note=kè/kèr/kòe - vernacular; kòa - vernacular (limited, e.g. {{zh-l|*罪過}}); kò/kò͘ - literary; ko͘/ko - literary; koa - vernacular
|mn-t=guê3
|w=2ku
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v,part,adv,n
}}
